title: The Burning Library of Forbidden Words
theme: Words, writing, and the violence of ideas - from books to prison through speech
narrative_arc: Books drawn → Attack fails → Deliberately rescue → Words spoken → Police plan prison → Poems read → Discuss this

characters.mnemonic_image: Brush + speak = recording words with writing tool
characters.story: They burn my BOOKS one by one. I SING 'SHOOOO!' - sustained screaming - as centuries of wisdom become ash in seconds.

characters.mnemonic_image: Brush strokes + field + one = creating images
characters.story: My DRAWING of the massacre is evidence. 'HWAH!' the censor COMMANDS it erased - but I've already memorized every face.
characters.tone_emotion: COMMAND - sharp order to destroy art

characters.mnemonic_image: Drawing + knife = cutting lines, making marks
characters.story: I SCRATCH my testament into the cell wall. I GASP 'HWAH?!' - will anyone find these words after I'm gone?
characters.tone_emotion: GASP - rising hope for posthumous discovery

characters.mnemonic_image: Work/craft + strike = skilled assault
characters.story: They ATTACK the library at dawn. I SING 'GOHNGGG!' - sustained alarm bell - but the soldiers are already inside.

characters.mnemonic_image: Shell/money + strike = wealth struck down, failure
characters.story: I FAIL to save even one manuscript. 'BYE!' I COMMAND my hopes goodbye - defeat is total and permanent.

characters.mnemonic_image: Old/ancient + strike = intentional action, with reason
characters.story: I DELIBERATELY hide the last scroll in my flesh. 'GOO!' I COMMAND the knife deeper - the words will survive inside me.
characters.tone_emotion: COMMAND - sharp intentional self-harm for preservation

characters.mnemonic_image: Seek + strike = forcefully seeking to save
characters.story: No one comes to RESCUE me from the flames. 'JYOW!' I COMMAND help to arrive - but heroes exist only in the books now burning.

characters.mnemonic_image: Bitter/alarm + strike = showing respect through discipline
characters.story: I REVERE the burning pages even as they die. 'JEENG!' I COMMAND my knees to bow - paying last respects to murdered wisdom.

characters.mnemonic_image: Still/yet + strike = opening wide, making space
characters.story: The SPACIOUS library hall is now empty ash. I GROAN 'Chahnggg...' - low echo - where thousands of scrolls once stood.

characters.mnemonic_image: Mouth with lines above = words emerging, layers of meaning
characters.story: My last WORDS are recorded by the executioner. I GASP 'YAHN?!' - will they twist my speech into confession?

characters.mnemonic_image: Revere + words = those who speak authority, warnings
characters.story: The POLICE drag me from the ashes. I GROAN 'Jeenggg...' - low rattle of chains - another thought criminal collected.

characters.mnemonic_image: Words + ten = counting words, calculating schemes
characters.story: Their PLAN is simple: erase all memory. 'JEE!' I COMMAND myself to remember anyway - counting each lost title.

characters.mnemonic_image: Dog + words + dog = trapped between accusers, barking guilt
characters.story: The PRISON holds only scholars now. 'YOO!' the warden COMMANDS us silent - but we whisper poems in the dark.

characters.meaning: To condemn / To demand / To suppress
characters.mnemonic_image: Words + inch = measuring words carefully, demanding account
characters.sound_bridge: TAOW = 'TOW the line or be condemned'
characters.story: They CONDEMN me for owning books. I GROAN 'Taowww...' - low resignation - guilty of literacy in an illiterate age.
characters.tone_emotion: GROAN - guttural acceptance of unjust verdict

characters.mnemonic_image: Words + river/flow = teachings flowing like water
characters.story: Their INSTRUCTION is lies only. 'SHOON!' I COMMAND my children to forget what the state teaches - remember what I whispered.

characters.mnemonic_image: Words + tongue = spoken language, conversation
characters.story: My WORDS are used against me at trial. 'HWAH!' the prosecutor COMMANDS them read aloud - my own tongue becomes the noose.

characters.mnemonic_image: Words + temple = sacred speech, elevated language
characters.story: I recite POEMS to stay sane in my cell. I SING 'SHIHHH!' - sustained verse - ancient words outliving modern tyrants.

characters.mnemonic_image: Words + I/my = personal language, one's own speech
characters.story: They ban my mother LANGUAGE. I GROAN 'Yooo...' - low defiance - speaking it anyway in the dark where no one hears.

characters.mnemonic_image: Words + sell = exchanging words, taking in text
characters.story: I teach my daughter to READ in secret. I GASP 'DOO?!' - did someone hear us sounding out the forbidden alphabet?

characters.mnemonic_image: Words + cycle = adjusting tone, harmonizing speech
characters.story: I ADJUST my TUNE to match the propaganda. 'DYAOW!' I COMMAND my voice to lie - survival requires false harmony.

characters.mnemonic_image: Words + flame = heated discussion, burning debate
characters.story: We DISCUSS rebellion in whispers. I GASP 'TAHN?!' - was that the informer's shadow at the door?

characters.mnemonic_image: Walking + writing/literature = pointing to this here, indicating
characters.story: THIS is the last word I write before they take me. 'JUH!' I COMMAND the ink to dry fast - THIS testament must survive.
